title: Honour Pls
body: guys, can you make the honour system a bit easier to climb? I get 1-2 honours each game and i haven't even gotten close to leveling to level 3.

replies.body: Agreed, or at least show your progress to next level
It's been out for, what, a month? I don't imagine they created it so that you could climb to the top in a matter of a few months.
